short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to wrap highlighted text in punctuation similar to code editors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sick of typing closing brackets or quotes?
Fear not this extension allows you to highlight the required text and wrap it just like your favorite code compilers!

Unfortunately this will not work in google docs :(.
